result.description: The number of read capacity units consumed over the specified time period, so you can track how much of your provisioned throughput is used.
result.displayName: AWS DynamoDB - Consumed Read Capacity Units
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_CONSUMED_READ_CAPACITY_UNITS

result.description: The number of write capacity units consumed over the specified time period, so you can track how much of your provisioned throughput is used.
result.displayName: AWS DynamoDB - Consumed Write Capacity Units
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_CONSUMED_WRITE_CAPACITY_UNITS

result.description: The number of provisioned read capacity units for a table.
result.displayName: AWS DynamoDB - Provisioned Read Capacity Units
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_PROVISIONED_READ_CAPACITY_UNITS

result.description: The number of provisioned write capacity units for a table.
result.displayName: AWS DynamoDB - Provisioned Write Capacity Units
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_PROVISIONED_WRITE_CAPACITY_UNITS

result.description: The number of read events that exceeded the preset provisioned throughput limits in the specified time period.
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_READ_THROTTLE_EVENTS

result.description: The number of items returned by a Scan or Query operation.
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_RETURNED_ITEM_COUNT

result.description: The number of successful requests in the specified time period. By default, SuccessfulRequestLatency provides the elapsed time for successful calls.
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_SUCCESSFUL_REQUEST_LATENCY

result.description: The number of requests generating a 500 status code (likely indicating a server error) response in the specified time period.
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_SYSTEM_ERRORS

result.description: The number of user requests that exceeded the preset provisioned throughput limits in the specified time period.
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_THROTTLED_REQUESTS

result.description: The number of requests generating a 400 status code (likely indicating a client error) response in the specified time period.
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_USER_ERRORS

result.description: The number of write events that exceeded the preset provisioned throughput limits in the specified time period.
result.name: AWS_DYNAMODB_WRITE_THROTTLE_EVENTS
